website_summaries.verdict: Sheet of 90 pre-cut magnetic squares, 20 millimeters by 20  millimeters. 2 millimeters thick.
pros: Stronger than other magnets of comparable size
Loved by crafters, teachers, and parents
cons: A minority of complaints that magnets are not strong enough

customer_reviews.title: Great for custom makeup palette
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for assembling custom makeup (eyeshadow, blush) palettes; specifically, I was using the empty MAC palettes. These magnets worked great because you can cut them as small as 1/4 size with regular scissors, so they fit products from all different brands, and they provided the perfect amount of adherence onto the palette - not too weak or too strong. They added a little height but if you have the room in the palette you’re using, I think it’s actually helpful because it makes the pan of product easier to pry off to move. The adhesive backing works very well too. These were a nice, less costly alternative to the magnets that are made for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Little Magpie

customer_reviews.title: Decent for Makeup Organization
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as magnetic as I would like them to be but they're alright. I had to use a lot of them, but they did the job. The big thing is they only really magnetized well one way so it's important to find it before sticking the items to the surface. I had to use about 4-5 for an eyeshadow pallet, if that helps with assessing how many you may need. If I open the door slowly it's fine, but if I'm even a but fast the makeup falls, so be aware these magnets can only do so much. If you found this review helpful, please let me know with an upvote :)
customer_reviews.author: Ana Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product to have if you are a crafter
customer_reviews.text: Great product to have if you are a crafter. I ordered these to make save the date magnets for my best friends wedding, but they can be used for absolutely anything. I have also used in the past to make art holders for my fridge. These magnets have good grip and work well for anything I have tried. I will always keep on hand, just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: weak
customer_reviews.text: the 20X20X2mm self adhesive squares are very weak. The picture shows batteries, scissors, etc., they wouldn't even hold my 2oz plastic (empty) spice containers on the magnet sheet. Didn't work on the refrigerator either for same container. I even tried 2 magnets side by side, no luck.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great for craft projects.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. The adhesive back is pretty strong. I use the magnets for a variety of craft projects. I just used these to make a holder for straight pins for sewing. The magnet worked well to hold the pins. This is a good product with a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen K. R.

customer_reviews.title: If you are doing a makeup board this is the way to go 100%! Wish I would have seen a headline like this LOL
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Unfortunately, this was my second attempt of purchasing magnets for my makeup board thank God I didn't have to make a third LOL OP LABS to the rescue..(b.c. I was so excited to get my DIY project done)! As you can see I have remnants of said magnets LOL OP labs are the magnets holding the heavy glass votive
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnets! Great price for high quality!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are thick and strong. I bought them to palette my makeup (depotting), but they're so thick and strong I'm using them for attaching items in baby food jars (bolts, screws, craft items) to metal surfaces. Great price, high quality!
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is strong enough, but the glue on the sticker side does not hold. These would be better off without a sticky side, then use your own double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: FLHTCUI

customer_reviews.title: Strong and fool proof
customer_reviews.text: Using the magnets I was able to organize my medicine cabinet within minutes.. I am impressed with how strong they are considering they are so thin.. the low profile allowed me to store tweezers and scissors on the door while not disturbing items on the shelves.. great product over all
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Sierens

customer_reviews.title: Classroom use: magnets have a good grip and hold light objects very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these magnets for a word wall in my classroom. I used one magnet per word (10.5" x 3.75" on laminated cardstock). They seem to stay up nicely on the whiteboard vs. a whole line of the regular rubber strip magnets. The adhesive is also nice and strong. I can get it off with some effort if I make a mistake, but they grip the laminate well. I will definitely be buying more of these, and I look forward to finding other uses for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are great for our holiday crafts/homemade gifts. Perforated for easy use. Strong and hold up nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome purchase! I made labels for my schedule and put the magnets on the back of the labels. I post the schedule using the labels on the whiteboard, and wow does it ever save me so much time!

customer_reviews.title: Very weak!
customer_reviews.text: Very weak! It can hold up a piece of paper or cardboard but nothing heavier.

customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get them to hold up anything even if I used several of them. I don’t know what there good for!

customer_reviews.text: Ordered them to use in making paper bookmarks with magnets, but they were not as strong as needed to be.

customer_reviews.text: I returned these magnets. Description says they will hold up to 3 oz. I attached one to a postcard and it fell off the refrigerator.

customer_reviews.title: What a neat idea. I have used almost half ...
customer_reviews.text: What a neat idea. I have used almost half of them already. I use them mostly in my office, but my daughter saw them and now they are all over her room also. Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom and home use!
customer_reviews.text: I use these primarily for my classroom and absolutely love them. For items that get a lot of use up and down on whiteboards, I've done away with clunky magnets and attached these instead. Great purchase, super happy.

customer_reviews.text: These magnets are admittedly pretty weak if you just use one or a small handful. But, if you use the whole pack or even several to secure something like a larger piece of paper/cardboard, then they work great.

customer_reviews.title: and they seem to be very good quality.

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a project and this product met my expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Hold Items In Place Over 50g
customer_reviews.text: These did not work. The claim that each square holds 88g (3oz) is completely false. I tried to use it to hold LED under cabinet lighting that weighed 75g and with 8 squares, it struggled to remain in place. Therefore, the specifications are misleading. It may be able to hold 25g but not certainly anything above 50g. I returned it as the product was misleading and did not serve the purpose it was purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Magnets for our Stainless Steel Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Finally, magnets for our stainless steel refrigerator. We use the adhesive side to stick to the stainless steel front and then we can use our small magnets to hold school papers, schedules and the menu for the week. We could only attach magnets/papers to the side of our refrigerator before we found these. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnets
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for some magnetic labels I made to attach to our appliances at home. Previous magnets I had tried wouldn't stick to the metal strongly enough and would fall off. These magnets are far superior -- great strength. They're also extremely easy to use -- just cut off the shape & size you need from the sheet, and peel the back off. They have nice, strong adhesive and hold really well to the labels I created. Great product, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: USNA76

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fast!
customer_reviews.text: Great sheet of magnets, seller shipped them extremely fast and packaging was nice & clean. I bought these to make several fridge magnet quotes to give as hand outs for a class I teach at church. In the past I’ve used the basic little round magnets and hot glued each one to the handout. Needless to say the adhesive backing on these is a time saver and I will never go back to hot gluing magnet projects. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: These magnets are strong!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set of magnets. You get a sheet of 90 total and they have a good strong hold when you apply them to a surface. We are going to use them for craft projects for Christmas for our family and friends. We will have lots of magnets left over... so I am planning on making an advent calendar with the rest! There are so many projects you can make with these and such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for crafts!
customer_reviews.text: I am making magnets for a the holidays and these work perfect. I like that I can cut them to change the scored size if I need a little more but not a full piece or if I need to add just a little more. The are very sticky and magnet sticks to the fridge with no issues. These are perfect for crafts and projects. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jmbilletTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I teach preschool and use magnets on the back of visual aids for my students' use on the magnet board. Overall, these magnets are great quality for the money. After some time, occasionally one may fall off but I find that hot glue reattaches them well.

product_meta.title: OP LABS Adhesive Magnets ! Tape Sheet of 90 Magnetic Squares for Crafts Mini Thin Small and Sticky Magnets ! Used as Magnetic roll, Strip and Stickers
product_meta.description:
Our new Anisotropic rubber magnets are 25% stronger then the rest of the rubber magnets! Great for DIY Office Kitchen Bulletin Refrigerator
Glue & tape leave things too fixed to their spot so it’s messy work to reorganize. Our square self-adhesive magnets are easy to put-up & pull-away
so you can update your boards and fridge quick & hassle-free. ClickADD TO CARTnow to keep your memo board up-to-date & uncluttered today.

OTHER TRICKS YOU CAN DO WITH SQUARE MAGNETS:

 * Use for manipulatives & laminates in camps or classes.
 * Hang prints without drilling holes into your walls.
 * Build transformer bots with your kids from used soda & beer cans.
 * Send personalized souvenir magnets using your photos & cards.
 * Create a no-pins memo board on your wall with mini square magnets & magnetic paint!


WILL THE MAGNETIC SIDE STICK TO EACH OTHER?

The magnetic sides do attract each other, but not so strongly as these are small & flat magnets. They create better pull on your fridge door & surfaces with magnetic material or coating.

WILL THIS HOLD FABRIC?


The adhesive side pretty much sticks to anything, but there are certain types of fabric such as wool that do not stick well to any type of adhesive.

If you don’t feel satisfied for any reason, don’t worry you're covered by our 100% Money Back Durahold Guarantee, no questions asked. ClickAdd
to Cartnow to keep your memo board up-to-date & uncluttered today.
feature_bullets: ✅ SELF ADHESIVE BACKING.. Magnetize your notes & photos without needing messy glue guns thanks to our heavy duty sticky backing!
✅ UNCLUTTERED FINISH .. with the 0.08" flat sheet , magnets are kept hidden from view. Turn your cluttered refrigerator magnet maze into a tidy & useful memo corner!
✅ EASY TO MERGE/TRIM TO SIZE.. with flexible magnetic tape sheets that you can cut to tiny pieces or merge to fit large posters or small trinkets. Spark conversations with a personal souvenir wall!
✅ JUST PEEL AND STICK.. Our stick on magnets are pre cut on a single sheet so it is a lot easier and faster to peel them compare to single magnets.
✅ 0.8" x 0.8" SQUARES are made from rubber and meant for light and everyday use!
